title: Liam Hemsworth mum 'never approved of Miley Cyrus from the start'
text:
Liam Hemsworth’s mum didn’t approve of Miley? (Picture: Rex/Getty)

While the rest of the world come to terms with the fact the Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth seem to be done for good, Liam’s family are reportedly ‘relieved’ that the pair have finally split.

In fact, Liam’s mum, Leonie Hemsworth, may have never given Miley her seal of approval in the first place. Cringe.

The celebrity pair, who tied the knot in December last year, had been in a relationship for the best part of a decade before deciding to part ways.

Despite many fans assuming (and hoping) that the 26-year-old singer and the 29-year-old actor were breaking up to make up, it seems that the pair are really going through with their split to the bitter end.

And it looks like the permanent break up may be for the best if the family never really approved of the country-pop singer from the start.

According to reports from Hollywood Life, The Hunger Games star retreated to his family home in Australia after the break up to spend some much needed time with his loved ones and avoid the ‘drama’.

Liam Hemsworth and Miley Cyrus tied the knot in December last year (Picture: Eric Charbonneau/REX/Shutterstock)

‘Liam really felt he needed his family after the break-up,’ the insider said. ‘They are very, very close’.

But it was something else that the source revealed that really got tongues wagging.

‘His mom is feeling so relieved that Liam made the decision to end the relationship as his entire family, but her especially, always struggled approving Miley,’ the source said.

‘[Liam] really struggled with the break-up and is going to be cautious and slow heading into the next relationship.’

The actor is reportedly even going as far as to include his mother Leonie in his future dating choices going forward.

The source continued: ‘It’s now very important for him to have his mother’s stamp of approval and he seems to be going in a different direction with what he’s looking for in a partner this time around. He’s really listening to his mother.’

With that being said, maybe mum Leonie might have had a hand in Liam’s recent love interest, girlfriend Maddison Brown.

The pair were first seen holding hands earlier this month in New York City after the star returned home from Australia.

Hemsworth was also seen dining at Sant Ambroeus with his 22-year-old date, with the pair sitting outside and enjoying drinks.

Liam is now dating Dynasty actress, Maddison Brown (Picture: Scott Ehler/WireImage for Witchery)

The pair are said to be taking things slow with their ‘very new’ relationship, although a source told People magazine Liam is ‘definitely interested in her’.

Meanwhile, Miley is also in a new relationship with Aussie musician Cody Simpson.

Prior to dating Cody, the singer was in also in a relationship with long-time friend Kaitlynn Carter just a month after her and Liam announced their split.

Metro.co.uk have reached out to Liam’s team for comment.
